remarks: A third common abbreviation for quantifier-free definitions. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-May-2014.)
statement:
brtxpsd2.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
brtxpsd2.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
brtxpsd2.3 $e |- R = ( C \ ran ( ( _V (x) _E ) (++) ( S (x) _V ) ) ) $.
brtxpsd2.4 $e |- A C B $.
brtxpsd3.5 $e |- ( x e. X <-> x S A ) $.
brtxpsd3 $p |- ( A R B <-> B = X ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d S x $.
$d X x $.
